item.title: Misrepresented Penix comment draws coach's ire
item.description: A viral clip of quarterback Michael Penix Jr. led to incorrect assumptions about the support system he has within the Falcons, coach Raheem Morris say...

item.title: Jets' Glenn 'evaluating everything,' including QB1

item.title: 'Last Chance U' coach Beam dies after being shot
item.description: College football coach John Beam, who was featured in the Netflix series "Last Chance U," has died after being shot, the Oakland Police Department sai...

item.title: Duke lands latest top-five prospect in Williams
item.description: Top-five prospect Cameron Williams has committed to Duke over Arizona and Texas, giving the Blue Devils the highest-ranked commit in the 2026 class.

item.title: Congress wants MLB answers on betting scandal
item.description: Members of Congress are asking MLB for answers about the alleged betting scheme that led to the recent indictments of two Guardians pitchers.
